Texts.Eng: A Trinkian flag. I can bookmark its location so my teleporter can return me here at any time.
A Trinkian flag. I can save its location for my teleporter, allowing me to return here later.
A Trinkian flag. I can use this as a waypoint for teleportation.
A locator module inside this Trinkian flag allows my ship's teleporter to bookmark this location.
A small locator module attached to this Trinkian flag allows it to be bookmarked for teleportation.
Flag-light, Akki no touch. Belong to Trink.
I can bookmark this Trinkian flag for quick teleportin'.
The Trink Circuit's flag. Use ^green;[E]^white; to bookmark a teleportation location.
The Trinkian flag. My ship's teleporter can sync with its location so I can return here later.
The Trinkian flag. The ship's teleporter can lock on to the locator module inside it, so I can return here later.
The flag of the Trinkian people. My teleporter can bookmark its location for later use.
The flag of the Trinks. I can save its location and return to it later using my teleporter.
This Trinkian flag can act as a way point, enabling me to return to this point using a teleporter.
This Trinkian flag can be bookmarked as a destination for my ship teleporter.
This Trinkian flag can be saved as a location for my teleporter. Then I can return to it any time.
Trinkian flag makess good point to teleport back to ussing teleporter!
Trinkian flag. Detected locator module. Ship teleportation system can lock on to this location.
